subject: Unable to connect MindsDB to PostgreSQL database
description: Customer reports a connection refused error when linking PostgreSQL via MindsDB UI. Likely firewall or port configuration issue.

subject: MindsDB container crashes on startup
description: User reports MindsDB Docker container exiting immediately with exit code 1. Logs indicate configuration load error.

subject: Cannot authenticate Snowflake integration
description: Snowflake credentials rejected when configuring MindsDB data source. User verified credentials separately via CLI.

subject: Predictions returning null values
description: Customer reports that /predict endpoint returns null predictions despite valid input rows. Issue under investigation by ML team.

subject: Unable to deploy model in MindsDB Studio
description: Deployment fails with error 'Invalid target column'. The dataset was previously used successfully for training.

subject: ClickHouse connection authentication failed
description: ClickHouse user authentication fails when connecting through MindsDB, but works in native client. Issue may be SSL-related.

subject: MindsDB Studio UI not loading datasets
description: Studio UI intermittently fails to display dataset list after page reload. Clearing browser cache temporarily fixes it.

subject: Error 500 on MindsDB /learn endpoint
description: MindsDB API returns 500 error when initiating model training. Error trace shows serialization issue in payload handler.

subject: Model accuracy dropped after retraining
description: Customer retrained a regression model and observed a sudden accuracy drop from 87% to 61%. Needs investigation for data drift.

subject: AutoML training stuck in preprocessing stage
description: Training job created through MindsDB Studio never progresses beyond preprocessing. No logs written after start.

subject: MindsDB unable to detect schema changes
description: Database schema changes not reflected in MindsDB until connection is recreated. Expected automatic schema refresh.

subject: SSL verification error during secure setup
description: User receives 'certificate verify failed' when enabling HTTPS on MindsDB. Likely self-signed certificate issue.

subject: MindsDB fails to infer numeric column type
description: Integer-like string columns are treated as categorical in the training phase. Affects prediction accuracy.

subject: MindsDB REST API integration fails in Flask app
description: Flask backend fails to parse JSON response from MindsDB REST API. Logs show 'Invalid JSON format'.

subject: Cannot access MindsDB UI on localhost
description: After setup, UI not accessible on port 47334. Checking if service bind address needs update.

subject: Database connection timeout error
description: MySQL connector times out during MindsDB connection test. Might be caused by DNS resolution issue.

subject: Model training fails due to missing target column
description: Training aborted with error 'Target column not found'. User uploaded dataset missing last column header.

subject: Error parsing JSON from MindsDB API
description: Integration script fails to parse prediction response. Response contains unexpected metadata field.

subject: Dataset upload fails for large CSV
description: CSV file >100MB fails to upload in MindsDB Studio with timeout error. User suggests chunked upload support.

subject: Error reading .env configuration in Docker build
description: MindsDB container ignores variables defined in .env file. Environment file verified to be in correct directory.
